title: 美使领馆停止发布空气质量数据 因预算限制中断更新_新闻频道_中华网
text:
美使领馆停止发布空气质量数据。美国国务院于3月4日宣布停止“全球空气质量监测”项目，这意味着美国驻外使领馆将不再发布空气质量数据。该项目自2008年启动以来，已有80多个美国使领馆在屋顶安装了空气质量监测器，并实时共享采集的数据。
据法新社报道，美国国务院称因预算限制无法继续提供空气污染数据。虽然历史数据仍保留在环境保护署的网站上，但实时数据已于4日停止更新，直到项目重新获得经费前将一直处于停滞状态。特朗普政府上台后大幅削减了海外及环境支出，目前相关数据页面已显示为“页面不存在”。
美国驻华使馆从2008年起开始监测并发布北京的空气质量数据，2011年开始发布广州的数据，2012年驻上海领事馆也开始发布数据。中国外交部发言人曾表示，外国驻华使领馆不具备在中国进行环境监测和发布相关数据的法定资质，也不具备专业能力和条件。
韩国国土交通部下属航空铁路事故调查委员会表示，务安坠机事故飞机的黑匣子在飞机撞毁前4分钟停止记录，导致部分记录缺失
生态环境部发布了2025年2月下半月全国空气质量预报会商结果

author: 小浪财讯
title: 金安国纪跌1.44%，成交额6.56亿元，今日主力净流入2069.66万|金安国纪_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
8月14日， 金安国纪 跌1.44%，成交额6.56亿元，换手率7.23%，总市值89.69亿元。
异动分析
PCB概念+消毒剂+医疗器械概念
1、2025年1月27日互动易：公司印制电路板（PCB）产品广泛应用在消费电子、LED 照明、汽车电子、应用电子、通讯、医疗等众多领域。
2、2020年3月30日公司在互动平台称：集团旗下全资子公司广西禅方药业有限公司生产并销售消毒液。
3、2020年2月25日公司公告称：公司子公司上海埃尔顿医疗器械有限公司主要从事研发、生产内镜诊治器械的医疗器械生产。
(免责声明：分析内容来源于互联网，不构成投资建议，请投资者根据不同行情独立判断)
资金分析
今日主力净流入2069.66万，占比0.03%，行业排名4/61，连续3日被主力资金增仓；所属行业主力净流入-38.43亿，当前无连续增减仓现象，主力趋势不明显。
区间 今日 近3日 近5日 近10日 近20日 主力净流入 2069.66万 2603.40万 7243.01万 -4723.36万 -2.83亿
主力持仓
主力没有控盘，筹码分布非常分散，主力成交额8262.67万，占总成交额的4.9%。
技术面：筹码平均交易成本为12.26元
该股筹码平均交易成本为12.26元，近期该股获筹码青睐，且集中度渐增；目前股价靠近压力位12.50，谨防压力位处回调，若突破压力位则可能会开启一波上涨行情。
公司简介
资料显示，金安国纪集团股份有限公司位于上海市松江工业区宝胜路33号，成立日期2000年10月19日，上市日期2011年11月25日，公司主营业务涉及电子行业基础材料覆铜板的研发、生产和销售。主营业务收入构成为：覆铜板(含半固化片)88.49%，PCB4.14%，医药2.74%，医用器械2.70%，其他1.93%。
金安国纪所属申万行业为：电子-元件-印制电路板。所属概念板块包括：覆铜板、PCB概念、小盘、QFII持股、融资融券等。
截至3月31日，金安国纪股东户数4.38万，较上期增加1.67%；人均流通股16546股，较上期减少1.64%。2025年1月-3月，金安国纪实现营业收入9.59亿元，同比增长14.77%；归母净利润2336.36万元，同比增长212.22%。
分红方面，金安国纪A股上市后累计派现3.37亿元。近三年，累计派现1.67亿元。
机构持仓方面，截止2025年3月31日，金安国纪十大流通股东中，香港中央结算有限公司位居第三大流通股东，持股797.04万股，相比上期增加191.62万股。大成中证360互联网+指数A（002236）位居第五大流通股东，持股156.27万股，相比上期增加5.29万股。华夏智胜先锋股票(LOF)A（501219）退出十大流通股东之列。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: Eurosport_UK
title: scholes-man-utd-decision-to-cut-sir-alex-was-distasteful-and-disrespectful
text: Sir Alex Ferguson: Paul Scholes says it was 'distasteful' and 'disrespectful' to end legend's ambassador role Published 24/10/2024 at 20:01 GMT Paul Scholes has called the decision of INEOS and Manchester United to cut Sir Alex Ferguson's ambassadorial contract as "distasteful" and "a little bit disrespectful." The United legend, who won 38 trophies in a 26-year reign as manager, saw his role as ambassador terminated by INEOS as part of a cost-cutting procedure that has seen hundreds of club staff lose their jobs. Paul Scholes has reacted to INEOS' decision to terminate an ambassadorial contract with Sir Alex Ferguson, calling the move "distasteful". Ferguson is Manchester United's most successful manager, winning 38 trophies over 26 years, and was appointed as an ambassador following his retirement in 2013. Company accounts in 2014 show that the Scotsman's role earned him a salary of £2.16 million, and that agreement lasted for over a decade. But his role has been terminated as part of cost-cutting measures at Old Trafford. "I felt it was a little bit distasteful for what that man has done for the club, almost a little bit disrespectful," Scholes said on TNT Sports. "But they're new owners and new owners make changes, and they think what they're doing is best for the club. "Now if they think they can save whatever money it is, I know it's been said about £2m, I don't know if that's correct, but if they think they can use that elsewhere then so be it. "But this club owes a lot to Sir Alex Ferguson, it's where it is now mainly because of the success he had for so many years. "And probably the timing of it was a little bit poor as well, because they're in a really bad run of form. Could you have waited or done it before the season started, done it at the end of the season? "The publicity wasn't great around it, but Sir Alex will be fine, he'll go on, he'll still be the best ambassador this club could ever have." It is understood that Ferguson and the club reached an amicable agreement to cease his duties at the end of the current season, and that he will continue to remain as a non-executive director on the club's board. The decision marks a major step forward in Jim Ratcliffe's cost-cutting drive at United after 250 staff members were removed from the [club's payroll in the summer.](https://www.theguardian.com/football/article/2024/jul/05/sir-jim-ratcliffe-cuts-250-jobs-to-save-manchester-united-about-10m-a-year)TNT Sports will show over 500 matches from the UEFA Champions League, the UEFA Europa League and the UEFA Conference League across the 2024-25 season. The streaming home for TNT Sports in the UK is [discovery+](https://get.discoveryplus.com/gb/watch-tnt-sports-on-discoveryplus?utm_campaign=UK-TNT-D1-TNT-C7-TNT-BAU-DR-W-Football-ChampionsLeague-240101-NA&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=tntsports.co.uk&utm_content=story-content-text-subscribe&vid=5jnqm1evcbdd3r5r&cid=0ee1b05714eadfd3193bf34fbc4e5980&c=%7B%22875074%22%3A%221089459%22%2C%221086912%22%3A%221348017%22%2C%221284295%22%3A%221592332%22%2C%221286521%22%3A%221595043%22%7D), where fans can enjoy a subscription that includes TNT Sports, Eurosport and entertainment in one destination.Join 3M+ users on app Download Scan me Share this article Related Topics Advertisement Advertisement

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Dangerous waves hit California coastline
text:
Summary by Ground News Large waves and high surf are expected to pound much of the Southern California coastline Thursday and into the weekend. Forecasters warn the conditions could be dangerous and raise the risk of flooding. A high surf advisory and coastal flood advisory will be in effect until 10 p.m. Saturday for all Los Angeles County beaches. Share menu More

author: LaPresse
title: 15mila persone all’Angelus del Papa
text:
Bergoglio ha parlato di Haiti, Ucraina, Gaza e del Ramadan che inizia
Erano circa 15mila i fedeli presenti questa mattina in piazza San Pietro per la recita dell’Angelus con
 Papa Francesco. Lo rende noto la Gendarmeria Vaticana. Il Papa ha parlato di guerra (e di pace), di donne, della situazione di Haiti e del Ramadan.
“Preghiamo per la pace nella martoriata Ucraina e in Terra Santa. Cessino al più presto le ostilità che provocano immani sofferenze nella popolazione civile” ha detto Bergoglio. “Seguo con preoccupazione e dolore la grave crisi che colpisce Haiti e i violenti episodi avvenuti negli ultimi goirni. Sono vicino alla chiesa e al caro popolo haitiano che da anni è provato da molte sofferenze. Invito a pregare perché cessi ogni sorta di violenza e tutti offrano il loro contributo per far crescere la pace e la riconciliazione nel paese con il sostegno rinnovato della comunità internazionale”. E ha aggiunto: “Stasera i fratelli musulmani inizieranno il Ramadan. Esprimo a tutti loro la mia vicinanza”.

author: Daniel Payne; Catholic News Agency
title: Pope Francis washes the feet of inmates at women’s prison in Rome
text:
ROME— Pope Francis on Thursday washed the feet of 12 prisoners at a prison facility in Rome, with the pontiff continuing a regular tradition of holding the Mass of the Lord’s Supper at local penitentiaries.
The Holy Father told female inmates at the Rebibbia correctional facility, located about six miles from Vatican City, that Jesus “never tires of forgiving” but rather “we are the ones who get tired of asking for forgiveness.”
“We all have our small or big failures — everyone has their own story. But the Lord always awaits us, with his arms open, and never tires of forgiving,” the Holy Father said, according to Vatican News.
The pope during the Mass washed the feet of 12 of the female prisoners present. The dozen inmates were of “different nationalities,” the Vatican said.
The pope subsequently “met with the inmates and staff of the penitentiary” and received several gifts including products from the prison complex’s farm.
In years past, Francis has traveled to prisons and other facilities in and around Rome to wash the feet of marginalized individuals.
In 2023 he washed the feet of 12 young men and women at the Casal del Marmo juvenile detention center on Rome’s outskirts.
Francis instituted the custom shortly after the start of his papacy. After visiting the Casal del Marmo youth detention center in 2013, he presided at Holy Thursday Masses at a center for the disabled in 2014, the Rebibbia New Complex Prison in 2015, a center for asylum seekers in 2016, Paliano prison in 2017, Rome’s historic Regina Coeli prison in 2018, and Velletri men’s prison in 2019.
The Holy Father skipped the tradition in 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

author: 网易
title: 创新科技推 2.1 声道回音壁 Stage Pro：支持声场拓宽，199 新元|音响|stage|心率监测功能_网易订阅
text:
IT之家 7 月 31 日消息，Creative 创新科技 29 日宣布推出高性能 2.1 声道条形音响 / 回音壁 Stage Pro。其 支持创新科技独家 SuperWide 声场拓宽技术 ，实现超越音响物理限制的广域音频投射。
Stage Pro 本体左右输出均为 20W RMS，配套的大冲程低音炮输出为 40W RWS ，可提供出色音效与深沉有力的低音表现。
其支持标准 AUX、HDMI ARC CEC、USB-C、光纤和蓝牙 5.3 输入， 支持 Dolby Audio 杜比音效，具备面向电视的远场模式和面向显示器的近场模式 ，无论搭配哪种视频输出设备均能带来沉浸音频体验。
Creative 创新科技 Stage Pro 条形音响在企业总部所在地新加坡的售价为 199 新加坡元（IT之家注：现汇率约合 1108 元人民币），在中国香港则是 1388 港币（现汇率约合 1271 元人民币）。

author: VNExplorer
title: Bill Bratton’s right, Mayor Adams: Don’t surrender to pro-Hamas ‘protester’ goons
text:
Pro-Palestinian protesters blocking the Van Wyck Expressway by JFK Airport on Dec. 27, 2023. Stephen Yang for NY Post
Former NYPD Commissioner Bill Bratton is right: The city needs to start treating unruly pro-Hamas “protesters” as the goons they are — especially as they’re mobilizing to target the iconic New Year’s Eve celebration in Times Square.
Police officers should not be treating the volatile, traffic-snarling, antisemitic “Flood NYC for Palestine” demonstrators with kid gloves.
They’re not simply exercising their free-speech rights: They’re attacking civic life.
They’ve done their best to disrupt the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day parade, the annual tree lighting at Rockefeller Center, Christmas services at St. Patrick’s Cathedral and caroling in Washington Square Park.
They’ve targeted commuters by aiming to close Grand Central and blocking the Brooklyn Bridge, and harassed holiday travelers by closing traffic at JFK.
This isn’t speech, it’s intimidation and blackmail.
As Bratton advises, the city should be hitting them with criminal charges that can “screw them up for the rest of their damn lives.”
He’s also right that the city gave up crucial public-order ground in settling the lawsuit over the also-unacceptable “protests” after the 2020 death of George Floyd.
Bad enough that City Hall agreed to pay $13 million — nearly $10K per rioter arrested during that summer’s looting and arson; worse that the Adams administration put an end to NYPD “kettling” of disruptive crowds, which allowed for orderly resolution of civic-blackmail efforts like the pro-Hamas crew is pulling now.
Mayor Adams defended that as ensuring that “we are both protecting public safety and respecting protesters’ First Amendment rights”; now he admits it has made officers “hesitant” in handling large, out-of-control marches.
He blames the advice of city lawyers for accepting the kettling ban; sorry, sir, the buck stops at your desk.
It’s time to tear up that agreement and let Police Commissioner Edward Caban and the NYPD’s ranks do their job.
These “protesters” are warring on your city, Mr. Mayor: Stop the pre-emptive surrender.

author: Junio Silva
title: Antes de debate, campanha de Biden lança site com ataques contra Trump
text:
Antes de debate, campanha de Biden lança site com ataques contra Trump
Campanha de Joe Biden lançou um site criticando a agenda política de Donald Trump, tratado como uma espécie de marionete da direita dos EUA
atualizado
Compartilhar notícia
Poucas horas antes do primeiro debate presidencial das eleições de 2024, a campanha de
Joe Biden lançou um site atacando a agenda política de Donald Trump, classificada pelos democratas como uma ameaça à democracia dos Estados Unidos.
O site critica abertamente o Projeto 2025, que engloba propostas políticas da think tank conservadora The Heritage Foundation, e trata Trump como uma espécie de marionete de setores importantes da direita estadunidense.
“O Projeto 2025 é o plano dos aliados republicanos do MAGA [Make America Great Again] de Donald Trump para dar a Trump mais poder sobre sua vida diária, destruir os freios e contrapesos democráticos e consolidar o poder no Salão Oval se ele vencer. Os conselheiros de campanha de Trump e aliados próximos o escreveram – e estão fazendo tudo o que podem para elegê-lo para que ele possa executar seu manual imediatamente”, diz o texto de apresentação do portal.
A proposta, segundo a campanha democrata, dá diretrizes a serem implementadas por Donald Trump caso o candidato republicano vença as
eleições deste ano.
De acordo com a campanha de Biden, a agenda política proposta por aliados de Trump é uma ameaça à Constituição dos EUA, além de usar a presidência para se vingar de inimigos pessoais e de controlar os “freios e contrapesos democráticos” do poder presidencial.
O debate entre Joe Biden e Donald Trump acontece nesta quinta-feira (27/6), a partir das 21h (horário de Brasília).
